name: places/ChIJscwDB5hYwokR-yxzOuZP7pI
adrFormatAddress: 1056 5th Ave, New York, NY 10028-0112, USA

originalText.text:
Dr Capeci did a hip replacement about a year and a half ago on my wife. The hip healed fine. But she traded one problem for another.

She's stuck with nerve damage that won't heal after two years!
Burning, Itching, Numbness, Pain, & sleepless nights for over a year now. Avoid this butcher at all costs!!

originalText.text:
I recieved top notch care from the initial consultation and throughout the entire process.
Everything was explained, all questions answered and the support was amazing

Dr. Capeci is skillful, compassionate and in my opinion a miracle worker.

It has been 3 weeks post op and I feel like i have a new lease on life.

I am fortunate i was referred to him by a friend!

originalText.text: Dr. Capeci gave me a hip replacement . I was healing excellent . I took a fall down a flight of stairs and impacted my prosthesis into my femur and broke my femur. He had me back in surgery in 2 days. He gave me another new hip. I feel terrific . My hip feels incredible. I'm scheduling my other hip soon. He's a great Dr. I recommend him to all. He explains everything very clearly , he's patient , he has excellent bedside manner and a terrific team. You will not be disappointed.

originalText.text: Dr. Capeci was very helpful and descriptive with my ruptured Achilles heel. He was very cooperative with questions I had and explaining everything he was doing. He is very clear and to the point. Although still recovering from surgery, I feel like my surgery went well and am looking forward to the results.

text.text: Dr. Capeci was very helpful and descriptive with my ruptured Achilles heel. He was very cooperative with questions I had and explaining everything he was doing. He is very clear and to the point. Although still recovering from surgery, I feel like my surgery went well and am looking forward to the results.

originalText.text: Dr. Capeci operated on both my sons due to sports injury.  First, he fixed my older son's ACL, which has healed nicely.  Second, he fixed my younger son's broken clavicle, which has healed nicely as well.  Dr. Capeci has a great bedside manner, never long waits in the waiting room for follow-ups and everyone in his office was always friendly and professional.  I highly recommend Dr. Capeci!
